text: Youssef Mohammed Karam Taher (born 15 July 1993) is a Kuwaiti sprinter specialising in the 400 metres and 400 metres hurdles. He represented his country at the 2018 World Indoor Championships reaching the semifinals. ==International competitions== {| |- !colspan="6"|Representing |- |2009 |Asian Youth Games |Singapore |bgcolor=cc9966|3rd |400 m hurdles (84 cm) |54.80 |- |2014 |Asian Games |Incheon, South Korea |15th (h) |400 m hurdles |52.15 |- |2016 |Asian Indoor Championships |Doha, Qatar |6th (sf) |400 m |47.88 |- |rowspan=3|2017 |rowspan=2|Arab Championships |rowspan=2|Radès, Tunisia |bgcolor=gold|1st |400 m |46.45 |- |4th |4 × 400 m relay |3:08.55 |- |Asian Championships |Bhubaneswar, India |7th |400 m hurdles |51.36 |- |rowspan=3|2018 |rowspan=2|Asian Indoor Championships |rowspan=2|Tehran, Iran |bgcolor=silver|2nd |400 m |46.66 |- |4th |4 × 400 m relay |3:14.75 |- |World Indoor Championships |Birmingham, United Kingdom |9th (h) |400 m |46.861 |- |rowspan=5|2019 |rowspan=2|Arab Championships |rowspan=2|Cairo, Egypt |bgcolor=silver|2nd |200 m |20.81 |- |bgcolor=silver|2nd |400 m |46.06 |- |rowspan=2|Asian Championships |rowspan=2|Doha, Qatar | – |200 m |DQ |- |bgcolor=gold|1st |400 m |44.84 |- |World Championships |Doha, Qatar |21st (h) |400 m |45.741 |} 1Did not finish in the semifinals ==Personal bests== Outdoor *400 metres – 46.27 (Doha 2015) *800 metres – 1:54.14 (Kuwait City 2015) *400 metres hurdles – 50.90 (Bhubaneshwar 2017) Indoor *400 metres – 46.66 (Tehran 2018) ==References== Category:1993 births Category:Living people Category:Kuwaiti male sprinters Category:Kuwaiti male hurdlers Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 2014 Asian Games Category:Asian Games competitors for Kuwait Category:Asian Athletics Championships winners
title: Yousef Karam
